channel.title: Still my cachedownloader isn't working
channel.description:
This is the link to my singlink.java
http://codepaste.net/46rzq9
maybe theres something wrong inthere?
Code for the cache in client.java
http://codepaste.net/gohvn8
Please help me ;-;
Already thanks Qeruina

item.title: Still my cachedownloader isn't working
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

qeruina:

I select all the files and right click add them to winrar archive and choose the zip option.

Okay… But that also does not change the fact that your URL is bad…

sk8rdude461:

Also, I went to your link supplied in the client. It gives a 401. Which would be why it does not work.

A 401 error is a security error. You need to make sure you put the zip in the “public” folder (if you have it) or in a non-shared folder (Shared folders on dropbox are private iirc)

Read full topic

item.title: Still my cachedownloader isn't working
item.dc:creator: @malimt malimt
item.description:
@malimt wrote:

SK8RDUDE is right.
I have personally made many posts here before and he’s helped.
I’ve had my fair share of time with cache’s.
How are you zipping your cache?

Read full topic

item.title: Still my cachedownloader isn't working
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Like I said last time, the problem is your zip file.
Make sure you’re A) Zipping the file correctly and B) Supplying the correct link.

If both of those are correct, and there’s still an error, it’s your CacheDownloader, not your signlink, and not your client.

Also, I went to your link supplied in the client. It gives a 401. Which would be why it does not work.

Read full topic
